page.title: 16Employment in Stafford.
page.content: Sample of Men. Sample of Women. --------------------|----------------- Farmer 1 Cook 1 G.E.C. 4 Evode 1 B.R.C. 1 Housewife 7 Builder 2 Dinner Lady 1 Council 1 G.E.C. 2 Window Fitter 1 Cleaner 1 British Telecom 1 Secretary 2 Training Officer 1 Taxi Driver 1 Universal 2 Swan Hotel 1 Prison Doctor 1 Nurses 3 Dustbin Man 1 Newsagents 1 Salesman 1 Manageress 1 Fabrications 1 Computer Group 1 Newsletter 1 Suttcliffe 1 Building Merchant 1 Unemployed 3 Dead 1 Sample study of employment based on the parents of 30 children in one class.
